[bq="EHAN"]"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dec3306368721dda2f1100#post_54dec3306368721dda2f1100
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dec2c06368724b01ba2000#post_54dec2c06368724b01ba2000
Except that the fanservice is half of the joke. It's not playing it seriously or erotically at all.[/bq]
"@igotnopicks":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dec33763687271c0be0300#post_54dec33763687271c0be0300
[bq="igotnopicks"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dec2c06368724b01ba2000#post_54dec2c06368724b01ba2000
Fanservice is okay if done right.

This show does it right.[/bq]
Like I said

I just don't like fanservice in -_*any*_- form [spoiler](okay maybe like 0.04% of the time but I doubt KLK has my fetish)[/spoiler]


"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dec3516368724399f30400#post_54dec3516368724399f30400
[bq="Shadow the Hedgehog"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dec32a63687245705f0b00#post_54dec32a63687245705f0b00

Have you watched just _one_ episode?[/bq]
Seen a couple scenes, I can see for sure that there's a lot to like about KLK

Two things I particularly love about it is the beautiful visuals and animation and the diverse cast of characters

But I'm just a biased little shit I guess[/bq]
bumping to next page
